channel.title: Tensorflow on miracle of light
channel.description: Recent content in Tensorflow on miracle of light

item.title: tensorFlow 入门
item.description: 环境搭建 pyenv搭建 安装pyenv 安装pip virtualenv 创建虚拟环境 python3 -m venv ./env 切换环境 . env/bin/activate conda搭建 安装anaconda3 创建虚拟环境 conda create --name py3 python=3 环境切换 source activate py3 tensorflow安装(下面操作都在python3环境下操作) ##我本地环境如下搭建 # conda create --name mytensor python=3.6 # source activate mytensor # source deactivate #退出环境 pip install tensorflow pip install tensorlayer 验证环境安装 import tensorflow as tf hello = tf.
